## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fileremover">FileRemover</a> - This class is a simple object meant to be stack allocated.

If an exception is thrown from a region, the object removes the filename specified (if deleteIt is true).

Definition at line 42 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/fileutilities-h">FileUtilities.h</a>.

<MemberDefinition

setFile - Give ownership of the file to the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fileremover">FileRemover</a> so it will be removed when the object is destroyed.

If the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fileremover">FileRemover</a> already had ownership of a file, remove it first.
